snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the U.S. national team, on Monday unveiled the 30 players he is taking to training camp. Twenty-three will go to Brazil.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; United States men's soccer coach Jurgen Klinsmann names 30 players to a preliminary roster for the 2014 World Cup, which begins in June in Brazil; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the U.S. national team, on Monday unveiled the 30 players he is taking to training camp. Twenty-three will go to Brazil.

headline.seo: U.S. Soccer Team Unveils Preliminary World Cup Roster
headline.main: Countdown to 2014 World Cup in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Preliminary U.S. Roster Named for Cup

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
